message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. It's a great opportunity to get it at a slight discount while still securing a high-quality item worth more than its value to you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $85.  It's still a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident this product will be a great value.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet in the middle. I propose an offer of $90 for the product. This allows you to save some money compared to the original price, while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me.
